attr.title: Super Meat Boy
attr.desc: Super Meat Boy is a 2010 platform game designed by Edmund McMillen and Tommy Refenes under the collective name of "Team Meat". It was self-published as the successor to Meat Boy, a 2008 Flash game designed by McMillen and Jonathan McEntee.
attr.inst:
Copy the Super Meat Boy (for Linux) game files to the ports/supermeatboy directory.

If you are on Windows, you can grab the linux gamefiles by opening your Steam console, and running:

	download_depot 40800 40802 6556596646716197166
